sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: George Bancroft, Esther Ralston, Warner Oland, Morgan Farley
Director: John Cromwell
A hardened gangster's life takes an unexpected turn when he‚Äôs drafted into World War I. On the battlefield, he transforms from mob enforcer to war hero, but a promise to a fallen comrade will alter his future forever.

Welcome to Friday @PizzaFLIX! Tonight's classic film spotlight is a gripping Pre-Code Hollywood drama starring George Bancroft, Esther Ralston, Warner Oland, and Morgan Farley. Directed by the talented John Cromwell, this rare gem combines the gritty world of gangster films with the harrowing reality of World War I movies.

Follow the powerful story of a hardened mob enforcer whose life takes a dramatic turn when he's drafted into the Great War. As he faces the brutal trenches of WWI, he transforms from ruthless gangster to celebrated war hero. But a dying promise to a fellow soldier changes the course of his destiny forever.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

If you're a fan of classic gangster movies, 1920s cinema, Pre-Code Hollywood films, and vintage war dramas, this is a must-watch! Dive into the cinematic history of George Bancroft, known for his tough guy roles, and enjoy the remarkable performances of Esther Ralston and Warner Oland.

sources.title: The Mighty (1929)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. This action-war film follows a gangster as he is drafted in the great war. The plot follows his time in the military and aftermath. George Bancroft led this film in the same year that he was nominated for an Oscar for Thunderbolt, although this film is decidedly less acclaimed.¬†

metadata.Plot: A gangster's henchman becomes a hero after he is drafted to serve in the Great War.
metadata.Writer: Grover Jones, Robert N. Lee, Herman J. Mankiewicz
metadata.Actors: George Bancroft, Esther Ralston, Warner Oland
